name: Diable Avionics Ship Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the ship hulls and fighter LPCs from the "Diable Avionics Corporation" school of design.

name: Diable Avionics Weapon Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the weapons from the "Diable Avionics Corporation" school of design.

name: Diable Avionics Wanzer Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the "Diable Avionics Corporation" proprietary wanzer LCPs.
